wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Britten  (born 6 March 1858) was a Welsh footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team between 1878 and 1880, playing 2 matches. He played his first match on 23  March 1878 against Scotland and his last match on 27 March 1880 also against Scotland. Britten played for the Glasgow club Parkgrove and for a Glasgow select in an inter-city challenge match. In 1880 he played for Presteigne.
